notes.text: We've resolved an issue where the EditState filter didn’t behave correctly when used inside nested MultiFilters
We now ensure that the textFromValueList property is correctly used as fallback text for the field
We've resolved an issue where manifest settings weren't applied to charts on the object page
We now ensure using a binding expression for the readOnly property in the Field building block works correctly
Tree tables now support the copy and paste functionality
You can now include the AI icon for AI actions in both annotation-based buttons and extension buttons
Analytical list page applications now support data aggregation based on visible table columns
You can now configure the semanticObject and readOnly properties in the manifest.json file for the Field building block
We've introduced the MessageButton building block
We now ensure that the title of a section is visible when the section has multiple subsections
We've introduced a Page Building Block
You can now use the resetFlexChanges property to enable or disable flex changes on the FilterBar building block
We now use the correct HTTP request method for file uploads in a table
We now support case-sensitive filtering in tables within the value help dialog
Multi-input fields now work correctly when readOnly is set to false
We've resolved an issue with setting a dynamic semantic object in the Field building block
We've updated the API documentation for the Table building block to support the group option in the table personalization for both responsive and analytical tables
We’ve resolved an issue with the Continue button not working in the Create dialog because of the transient binding context
We now determine the visibility of a facet by the UI.Hidden annotation first, followed by whether all the facet's contents are hidden.
The More button of multi-input fields is now displayed correctly
We've improved the performance of the mass edit dialog by reducing the number of requests when executing side effect actions
